definitions.definition: A very small piece of plush material such as lint .
examples: You've got a fuzzy on your coat.

definitions.definition: Something covered with fuzz or hair, as an animal or plush toy.
A person, especially a college student , interested in humanities or social sciences , as opposed to one interested in mathematics , science , or engineering .
A soldier with the rank of private .

main_definition: ( often in the plural ) A very small piece of plush material such as lint .
secondary_definitions: Something covered with fuzz or hair, as an animal or plush toy.
( slang ) A person, especially a college student , interested in humanities or social sciences , as opposed to one interested in mathematics , science , or engineering .
( slang , military ) A soldier with the rank of private .
